SEARCH
Package com.example.baobook.model

Class MoodHistoryManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.baobook.model.MoodHistoryManager
public class MoodHistoryManager extends Object
Manager class for handling mood history globally. Stores a list of MoodEvent, can sort them by date, and provides a getFilteredList() method for all filtering logic.

    • getFilteredList

      public ArrayList<com.example.baobook.model.MoodEvent> getFilteredList(com.example.baobook.model.Mood filterMood, boolean filterRecentWeek, String filterWord)
      Filters the mood list based on mood type, recent week, and keyword in description.
      Parameters:
      filterMood - the Mood to filter by (null to skip this filter)
      filterRecentWeek - true to filter only events from the last 7 days
      filterWord - keyword for partial matching in descriptions (null or empty to skip)
      Returns:
      a filtered and sorted list of MoodEvents
